description: The child's disappointment over a pirate movie rating.
title: Pirate Flick
n_1: Billy spotted a pirate movie poster and got excited.
c1_1: Can we watch this pirate movie, Mom?
n_2: Mom looked up the movie details on her phone.
n_3: Billy looked confused, not understanding the rating.
c2_3: It means it's for adults, dear.
n_4: Billy felt disappointed, realizing he's too young for it.
c1_4: I'll be a pirate when I'm older!
